cancelContest().details: Only the organizer can cancel the contest.

params.entryEndTime: The end time for the entry period (Unix timestamp).
params.entryStartTime: The start time for the entry period (Unix timestamp).
params.maxEntriesPerParticipant: The maximum number of entries a participant can submit.
params.maxTotalEntries: The maximum total number of entries allowed in the contest.
params.organizer: The address of the contest organizer.
params.title: The title of the contest.
params.votingEndTime: The end time for the voting period (Unix timestamp).
params.votingStartTime: The start time for the voting period (Unix timestamp).

deleteEntry(uint256).details: Only the contract owner can delete entries.

params.entryId: The ID of the entry to delete.

getAllEntryIds().details: This function returns an array of entry IDs, including both active and deleted entries. It can be used to get an overview of all entries ever submitted to the contest.

returns._0: An array of `uint256` representing the IDs of all entries.
A `ContestDetails` struct with the contest's title, description, entry/voting timeframes,organizer, maximium total entries and maximium entries per participant.
The current status as a `ContestStatus` enum value.

getDeletedEntryIDs().details: This function returns an array of entry IDs that have been marked as deleted. It can be useful for tracking entries that have been removed.

returns._0: An array of `uint256` representing the IDs of deleted entries.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: The ID of the submitted entry.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelContest().notice: Cancels the contest, preventing further actions.

constructor.notice: Initializes the Contest contract with the given parameters.

deleteEntry(uint256).notice: Deletes an entry by its ID.

getAllEntryIds().notice: Retrieves the list of IDs for all entries submitted to the contest.

getContestDetails().notice: Retrieves the contest details including title, description, timings, organizer, maximium total entries and maximium entries per participant.

getContestStatus().notice: Returns the current status of the contest.

getDeletedEntryIDs().notice: Retrieves the list of IDs for all deleted entries.

submitEntry(string).notice: Submits an entry for the contest.
